descriptions.frontendDevelopment: Le d√©veloppement frontend est la pratique de construction de la partie visuelle d'un site web ou d'une application avec laquelle les utilisateurs interagissent directement. Il implique trois technologies principales : HTML ‚Äì structure le contenu, CSS ‚Äì stylise et con√ßoit la mise en page, JavaScript ‚Äì ajoute de l'interactivit√© et un comportement dynamique. Le frontend moderne utilise √©galement des frameworks (comme React, Vue, Angular) et des outils (comme Tailwind, Next.js) pour cr√©er des exp√©riences utilisateur plus rapides, r√©actives et engageantes.

kakatiyaAssessment.title: Kakatiya University Entrance Assessment
kakatiyaAssessment.description: Complete this assessment to showcase your AI and full-stack development skills and qualify for our scholarship program.
kakatiyaAssessment.fullDescription: Welcome to the Kakatiya University Entrance Assessment! Instructions: 1. This assessment contains multiple-choice questions covering various topics including Mathematics, Logical Reasoning, English, and Programming. 2. You have 120 minutes to complete the assessment. 3. Each question has four options (A, B, C, D). Select the best answer. 4. Once you submit an answer, you cannot change it. 5. Make sure you have a stable internet connection. 6. Do not refresh the page during the assessment. Good luck!

instructions.welcome: Welcome to the Kakatiya University Entrance Assessment!
instructions.instruction1: This assessment contains multiple-choice questions covering various topics including Mathematics, Logical Reasoning, English, and Programming.
instructions.instruction2: You have 120 minutes to complete the assessment.
instructions.instruction3: Each question has four options (A, B, C, D). Select the best answer.
instructions.instruction4: Once you submit an answer, you cannot change it.
instructions.instruction5: Make sure you have a stable internet connection.
instructions.instruction6: Do not refresh the page during the assessment.

sections.unlockPerks: UNLOCK THESE PERKS WITH THE TEST
sections.whyMattersText: We're already in touch with companies actively hiring for AI-powered and no-code roles. If you ace this assessment, you may qualify directly for placement interviews with our partner companies.
sections.whatIfLowScore: What if you don't score high?
sections.whatIfLowScoreText: No worries. That's exactly why we're here.
sections.personalizedPath: If your results show there's room to grow, we'll offer you personalized upskilling pathways ‚Äî through our industry-grade programs ‚Äî designed to help you become a high-impact individual in AI and full-stack development.
